data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: If one day in the future when fossil fuels have been replaced by clean energy, the air we breathe will be cleaner and there is no smog caused by the emission of carbon dioxide. Nowadays, people living in my hometown are suffering heavily from pollution caused by the burning of fossil fuels, especially coal. In winter, we cannot see the objects 100 meters away and cough a lot due to air pollution. If fossil fuels can be gotten rid of, I don't need to worry about rhinitis and cough anymore. Moreover, the global warming phenomenon will also be eased, which otherwise, will lead to the rising of the sea level. Some islands, such as Bali, would be submerged if the current rising continues. If we take the action to stop using fossil fuels, I may still have the opportunities to travel to these islands. (148字)
data.referenceText: How might life be different if we didn't need to consume fossil fuels for energy?
data.referenceTranslate: 如果停止使用化石燃料，我的生活会变的怎样不同？
